channel.title: Wow
channel.description: ok, i need so much help! 1. for the tutorials, is there more you have to add, because i always get errors, even if the tut is made for my server base(pimpscape and testscape, i have 2). 2. next, i switched comps for hosting, i set everything up, but it still doesnt work, i think its w/ my firewalls (i have avast) and could some1 recommend some free security software, with good features, or just some securtiy software period. here is error for runserver [url=http://xs.to][img]http://xs114.xs.to/xs114/07150/error.png[/img][/url] 3. would some1 like to code for me? i have testscape and pimpscape servers, email me at th3g0d33@gmail.com or aim me at robocz033. 4. can anybody put up a very simple tut for hosting no-ip cuz i dowloaded the duc, put the exception in windows firewall, did the router stuff, but idk wat im missing( i did on my other comp and it worked) 5. can you even host more than one server at the same time on a comp w/ different ports? ok, thanks in advance for your help

item.title: Wow
item.dc:creator: @Tramposch Tramposch
item.description:
@Tramposch wrote:

To Q 5…
I think you should, because if they are different ports you should, because most of the things on the computer use different ports, so… if you are already doing it, why can’t you do it again? but im not sure if your hosting all the other things, well i guess Halo and Wow you would be hosting partly, like me but i really ant sure.

  1. q 2
    why did you switch comps? i think you could just stay with one computer, and i have never heard of avast.

Read full topic

item.title: Wow
item.dc:creator: @robocz033 robocz033
item.description:
@robocz033 wrote:

ok, i need so much help!

  1. for the tutorials, is there more you have to add, because i always get errors, even if the tut is made for my server base(pimpscape and testscape, i have 2).
  2. next, i switched comps for hosting, i set everything up, but it still doesnt work, i think its w/ my firewalls (i have avast) and could some1 recommend some free security software, with good features, or just some securtiy software period.
    here is error for runserver
  3. would some1 like to code for me? i have testscape and pimpscape servers, email me at th3g0d33@gmail.com or aim me at robocz033.
  4. can anybody put up a very simple tut for hosting no-ip cuz i dowloaded the duc, put the exception in windows firewall, did the router stuff, but idk wat im missing( i did on my other comp and it worked)
  5. can you even host more than one server at the same time on a comp w/ different ports?
    ok, thanks in advance for your help
